original_title: 生中継！超特急 BULLET TRAIN ARENA TOUR 2022「新世界 -NEW WORLD-」
overview: With the addition of a new member, Bullet Train now has a nine-member lineup. The live performance at Yoyogi National Gymnasium in Tokyo will be broadcasted exclusively live from the arena tour.
title: Live Broadcast! BULLET TRAIN ARENA TOUR 2022 "SHINSEKAI -NEW WORLD-" by Chotokkyu
